cause.description:
EPM is a disease caused by a protozoa, in horses and can be deadly if it advances throughout the spine, causing paralysis. There are treatments available, but they are not always successful. In loving memory of Boomer.
1. EPM can be and hard to diagnoise, and sometimes fatal, more research should be done to find a definite cure.
cause.mission: research EPM to find a definite cure
